name: ⚑ Capture The Flag ⚑
description:
Capture The Flag is a two - player arcade style game where you battle your opponent in a tactical game of offence and defense. 

Steal the opponents flag and return it to your side to score a point. The first person to have 5 points wins the match.

 You can attack your opponent by colliding into them when they are on your side of the field.
